definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病變會“漂白了”，成爲清潔傷口癒合後，將蛻皮。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibia fracture healing delays after ovariectomy.
sentences.chinese: 結論卵巢切除後，脛骨骨折癒合緩慢。

sentences.english: After treating the pus, namely can swell draws back the pus, rapid cicatrization.
sentences.chinese: 待出膿後，即能腫退膿盡，迅速癒合。

sentences.english: In addition, Chinese external medicine provided necessary support for treating ulcer after the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中藥外用藥的應用對創面的癒合提供了有力保障。

sentences.english: Does not my son left leg tibiofibula fracture 9 months heal?
sentences.chinese: 我兒子左腿脛腓骨骨折9個月還沒有癒合？

sentences.english: Once wound could heal slowly, my Bo Hui was recollecting.
sentences.chinese: 曾經的傷口會慢慢地癒合，我卜會甾回憶。

sentences.english: Time and rest will knit a fractured bone.
sentences.chinese: 時間和休息將使斷骨癒合。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of High-frequency electric surgical knives on abdominal incision healing.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻電刀對腹部切口癒合的影響。

sentences.english: Liver fibrosis is a wound healing process characterized by accumulation of extracellular matrix proteins.
sentences.chinese: 外基質沉積爲特徵的創傷癒合過程。

sentences.english: Constant thrusts from your eyes keep my pain fresh for ever.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼神不斷地戳傷我，令我的傷痛永遠難癒合。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of the nonunion of humeral shaft fracture treated by bidentate intramedullary locking nails.
sentences.chinese: 探討分叉交鎖髓內釘治療肱骨幹骨折不癒合的療效。

sentences.english: Shu Nian's leaving is an everlasting pain in Xie Yan, a wound that does not heal .
sentences.chinese: 舒唸的離去是謝炎永遠的痛，一個無法癒合的傷口。

sentences.english: Fighting fire with fire without reconciliation and healing will never solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 以火攻火，不能和解和癒合，絕難解決問題。

sentences.english: The cut in her hand has healed completely, without leaving a scar.
sentences.chinese: 她手上的刀傷完全癒合了，沒有留下一點傷痕。

sentences.english: The healing of fracture mainly is the acceleration of osteogenic activities and endochondral ossification.
sentences.chinese: 骨折癒合主要是成骨活動及軟骨內化骨加速。

sentences.english: To investigate the therapeutic effect of Zhuangjin Bugu Pill (BPZ) in promoting fracture healing.
sentences.chinese: 評價壯筋補骨丸促進骨折癒合的臨牀療效。

definition: to recover completely (from illness or injury)
to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
